roleset.name: turn the sole or palm inward

example.name: pronate-v: both args
example.text: He pronates his feet when he doesn't wear the inserts.
example.arg: when he doesn't wear the inserts.

example.name: pronation-n
example.text: Note that pronation of the forearm does not involve rotation of the upper-arm from the shoulder joint - which is a different movement.

roleset.note: PRONATE-V NOTES: Based on Sharp and Thyme data. No comparison. No Vn or Fn classes. Framed by Katie. (from pronate.01-v)
